root.name: Ninja Princess
root.description: A ninja-themed run gun shooter arcade game released by Sega in 1985, also known as Sega Ninja. It was one of the first games to feature a strong human female protagonist, in this case a kunoichi, i.e. female ninja.It was soon ported to the MSX and Sega SG-1000 home platforms. The Sega Master System port was re-titled The Ninja and featured a male protagonist instead of a female lead.
